# Vehicle Equipment Installation/Removal Services - Happy Valley-Goose Bay, NL
## Request for Standing Offer (RSO)

### Description
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is soliciting Offers to supply Labor, Materials and Supervision necessary for the Installation and Removal of Police Emergency Equipment, Safety Equipment, and Radio/Communication Gear on RCMP vehicles as required in the Happy Valley-Goose Bay region of Newfoundland and Labrador.

### Scope of Work
- Installation and Removal of Police Emergency Equipment, Safety Equipment, and Radio/Communication Gear on RCMP vehicles
- Provision of a secure outdoor storage compound for a minimum of 4 RCMP vehicles at any one time
- Execution of work as per the terms and conditions outlined in the attached documents or as directed by the Atlantic Region Fleet Manager or Site Authority

### Anticipated Work Volume
- 15 vehicles equipped and 15 vehicles de-equipped per 12-month period

### Contract Duration
- The Standing Offer will be for a period of 12 months with 3 additional 12-month options to extend

### Method of Evaluation
- Offers must comply with the requirements of the Request for Standing Offers and meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria to be declared responsive
- Responsive offers with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for issuance of a Standing Offer

### Contact Information
- Entity Name: RCMP
- Entity Address: 80 Garland Ave, H-066, Dartmouth, NS B3B 0J8, Canada
- Contact Name: Sandra Bremner
- Contact Email: sandra.bremner@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
- Contact Phone: (902) 717-5395
